txt.en:
'When the warriors of the kingdom of Arnor would come home from battle, they would etch the names of the fallen into these pillars, a permanent memorial of those who gave the greatest sacrifice.

'I spent many of my younger days wandering between these columns, my fingers sliding over the names etched into them, wanting to be one of the heroes of the past.

'Take some time and read the names that are left before they join their fallen companions, lost in time.'
'One day, we will rebuild this temple, and those who have fallen to preserve it will be etched into the new pillars.'
When they returned from a battle, the Men of Arnor would etch the names of the fallen into the pillars of an ancient building.

Orchalwë has asked you to read the names etched into the pillars.
Orchalwë wants to speak with you about the etched pillars.
